alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 27 at 1:45PM PDT until October 28 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 31 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In California, Portions of the Klamath River Valley, Shasta Valley, and Scott Valley. This includes the cities and communities of Happy Camp and Klamath River. In Oregon, portions of the Illinois Valley, Applegate Valley and Rogue Valley. This includes Cave Junction, Obrien, Williams, Applegate, Provolt, Rogue River, Eagle Point and While City. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 10 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some colder spots, especially in the southern end of the Illinois Valley around Obrien and Takilma, and portions of the Applegate Valley could see temperatures reach freezing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
